com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest

Class ApiVersionStrings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.ApiVersionStrings

  • public class ApiVersionStrings
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where all the API version info lives. This allows us to change one line here and affect all our api calls.
